description: Kris Jenner was feeling nostalgic for a simpler time on Thursday as she posted a sweet throwback snap of Kim and Kourtney as little girls.
title: Kris Jenner shares throwback photo of Kim and Kourtney as little girls
title_page: Kris Jenner shares throwback photo of Kim and Kourtney as little girls | Daily Mail Online
text:
Drama may rule in the Kardashian family at the moment.
And it appears Kris Jenner was feeling nostalgic for a simpler time on Thursday as she posted a sweet throwback snap of Kim and Kourtney as little girls.
The momager, 60, captioned the image: '#TBT @kourtneykardash @kimkardashian #family #love #proudmama P'.
Scroll down for video
Loves her girls! Kris Jenner was feeling nostalgic for a simpler time on Thursday as she posted a sweet throwback snap of Kim and Kourtney as little girls
Meanwhile, the following day Kris was seen arriving to Blac Chyna's house on Friday just days after her son Rob Kardashian moved into the Tarzana home.
Reclusive Rob, 28, revealed earlier this week his new romance with Chyna, who is Tyga's baby mama.
The relationship is said to have caused chaos for the Kardashian family as Rob is dating little sister Kylie Jenner's love rival.
See Kris Jenner updates as she shares throwback snap of Kim and Kourtney as little girls
The momager, 60, captioned the image: '#TBT @kourtneykardash @kimkardashian #family #love #proudmama P'
And it appears Kris' visit to Chyna's home was to talk some sense into her son, who is shacking up with the former exotic dancer.
TMZ reports that the former recluse, whose diabetes diagnosis saw him hospitalised last month, 'adores' the 27-year-old and is feeling 'happier than he's been in years'.
Rob is said to have moved in with the Chyna, who is mother to Tyga's son Cairo, after his big sister Khloe Kardashian 'threw him out' of her own home.
Here on family business: Kris was seen arriving to Blac Chyna's house on Friday just days after her son Rob Kardashian moved into the Tarzana home
Reclaim her boy: Reclusive Rob, 28, revealed earlier this week his new romance with Chyna, who is Tyga's baby mama
Source tell the website that Chyna is motivating him and that he will be staying indefinitely, with no intention to move back in with his sister.
This comes as his sister Kylie made it clear that her brother Rob is not her favourite person right now.
Just before the world realized that the 28-year-old reclusive Kardashian is dating Tyga's former fiancee, his little sister took reportedly took to social media and joked that Rob was no longer her brother and the devil.
While the apparent post has now been deleted, Twitter fan page UpdateJenner took a screen grab of it.
'#babykardashian': Rob Kardashian broke his social media silence to joke about his new reported girlfriend Blac Chyna having his baby on Tuesday
Tell us how you really feel: On Sunday, just before news broke that her brother was dating Tyga's ex, Kylie Jenner reportedly posted this rather telling 'joke' on Instagram before deleting it
The 18-year-old star allegedly re-posted another social media user's post of a drawing of the devil drawn by another woman's seven-year-old brother.
In response to the woman's question, 'what does this mean?', the original poster captioned the image: 'It means he is not your brother anymore, b***h get out of the house?'
